body:
We'll design, build and host a website you get to keep.
I promise they won't all look the same.
Coding can feel intimidating - but as long as you know how to copy&paste, you'll do great.
Learning can be very expensive. Here, no one will know or care if you pay $10 or $100.

comment:
// Hi there. This is a comment - just a little note for programmers that doesn't affect the code.
// The lines below are code that describes the styling of this website.
// Go a head and try to change something.

headline: Who's teaching?
body:
I'm Lisa. I have a degree in Computer Science and have been working as a Developer and IT Project Manager for 5 years. I taught coding as a teaching assistant and am excited to pick it up again.

It's freaking hard to be a woman in this field, but there's power in numbers. My plan is to increase these numbers.

headline: Why is it free-ish?
body: Everyone benefits from having a basic understanding of coding - and everyone should be able to afford that. At the end of each class, just throw in however much you can or want to. Think Yoga To The People with less sweat.
Leave your email and I'll reach out! We have weekly group sessions at Cafe Beit in Williamsburg, but I also do private lessons for special people.
* if you identify as a woman, you're in.
